name: whapplepaysdk/whapplepay
description: Empower your platform to seamlessly accept Whapple Pay payments with the Whapple Pay SDK. This comprehensive software development kit offers developers a robust solution for integrating Whapple Pay payment capabilities into their applications, ensuring a smooth and secure payment experience for users. Simplify payment processing and enhance user convenience with the Whapple Pay SDK, designed to streamline payment workflows and deliver exceptional payment acceptance functionalities.
